page.title: 10Coastguard
page.content: {Tiree is fully equipped except for a {boat.The coastguard has a flare for {boats in difficulty.They also have a {radio transmitter,which keep's Oban {in touch with other islands.Oban is {the main base for all the islands from {Tiree up to Shetland.They also have {hypothermia suits for swimmers that {have got into difficulty.How many men {need to man the station?15 men are {needed.The boat that is used is from {Oban.They have heavy flares to fire to {ships that are in difficulty.The {Coastguard also have lights that light {up things out at sea,when they are {searching in the dark. { {
